North Korea's Kim Jong Un turns 40. Maybe.North Korean leader Kim Jong Un is believed to have turned the big four-oh on Monday, but state media continued its decades of silence on his birthday. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:40:24 GMT YB4JPJFQARNJPDNOSMLVVITWMNY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-koreas-kim-jong-un-turns-40-maybe-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
China to conduct live firing drills in East China Sea on Jan 8-9China will conduct live firing drills in some areas in the East China Sea from 10 a.m. (0200 GMT) to 3 p.m. on Monday and Tuesday, according to the China maritime safety administration. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:35:45 GMT 7Y4A4TFDVZPYTCIHT5JKXBW6HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-conduct-live-firing-drills-east-china-sea-jan-8-9-2024-01-08/Reuters世界中国
Bangladesh PM Hasina: From champion of democracy to iron ladyBangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina once joined rivals in a fight to restore democracy but her long reign in power has been marked by arrests of opposition leaders, crackdowns on free speech and suppression of dissent. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:31:00 GMT JHNWFDNJHRNFHLJKYZBVO2JASM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-pm-hasina-champion-democracy-iron-lady-2024-01-08/Sudipto Ganguly, Ruma Paul世界亚太地区
India-Maldives row escalates, agency suspends flight bookings to islandsOne of India's largest travel platforms suspended flight bookings to the tourism-dependent Maldives on Monday after disparaging social media posts against Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi embittered relations between the South Asian neighbours. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 08:27:24 GMT QP6ZE622ZRPO3B3LRZBDAHQ3D4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/india-maldives-row-escalates-agency-suspends-flight-bookings-islands-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Two killed in Russian air strike on UkraineRussia fired missiles across Ukraine early on Monday in its latest mass air strike, killing at least two civilians and hitting residential areas and commercial sites, Ukrainian authorities said. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:43:24 GMT SE2L5WZKFZLD3FNEGMWBCZBXOY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-launches-missile-attacks-across-country-say-ukrainian-officials-2024-01-08/Dan Peleschuk, Pavel Polityuk世界欧洲
South Korea police arrest another man linked to attack on opposition leader -YonhapSouth Korean police on Monday arrested a man linked to an attack last week on opposition Democratic Party leader Lee Jae-myung, the Yonhap news agency reported. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:29:04 GMT QL3YGOZLNVJEFANV37KD2SCKOA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-police-arrest-another-man-linked-attack-opposition-leader-yonhap-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
Explainer: What is the genocide case against Israel at top UN court?The International Court of Justice will hold hearings this week on a case brought by South Africa accusing Israel of genocide in the Gaza war and seeking an emergency suspension of its military campaign. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 06:05:10 GMT D33QTG2OQNLGBB3ZKWDAYIXOAI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/what-is-genocide-case-against-israel-top-un-court-2024-01-08/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界中东
India court quashes early release of men in Muslim woman's gang-rape - lawyerIndia's top court on Monday quashed the early release of 11 Hindu men who had been jailed for life for gang-raping a pregnant Muslim woman and murdering her relatives during Hindu-Muslim riots in Gujarat state in 2002, a lawyer in the case said. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 05:38:08 GMT YUA2OT4ZFJLLPLRXOLWXHV2YJQ https://www.reuters.com/world/india/india-court-quashes-remission-given-11-hindu-men-muslim-womans-gang-rape-case-2024-01-08/Sakshi Dayal世界印度
US investigators recover key part from Alaska Airlines 737 MAX jetThe missing plug door was recovered by a Portland school teacher who found it in his backyard. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 05:21:55 GMT NXZDC762KVOBHOGBBTVRPJ4T4E https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/no-data-captured-alaska-airlines-737-cockpit-voice-recorder-ntsb-chair-2024-01-08/David Shepardson, Valerie Insinna, Tim Hepher商业航空航天与国防
Indonesia presidential frontrunner under fire as rivals attack defence plansIndonesian presidential frontrunner Prabowo Subianto suffered a barrage of attacks in a heated election debate on Sunday, with his two opponents taking aim at his military procurement strategy as defence minister, calling him reckless and wasteful. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 04:21:05 GMT E2WB6X4AONK6BJIPXQDDQB3OBY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-presidential-frontrunner-under-fire-rivals-attack-defence-plans-2024-01-08/Ananda Teresia, Bernadette Christina世界亚太地区
Ignoring Taiwan's complaints, more Chinese balloons spotted over straitTaiwan's defence ministry said it detected three more Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait on Sunday, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month. Mon, 08 Jan 2024 02:44:36 GMT MZVGLYUCP5IUDGULHDJMI7QKMA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/ignoring-taiwans-complaints-more-chinese-balloons-spotted-over-strait-2024-01-08/Reuters世界亚太地区
